[[File:FEANOR Full Score Cover.jpg|thumb|Cover for the full score by permission of Ted Nasmith]]
Published by Zarathustra Music in 2022, the complete Full Score of [[Paul Corfield Godfrey]]'s ''[[Fëanor, Op. 46 (Opera)]]'' updated to reflect amendments made during the production of Volante Opera Production's Demo Recording of the work.

This is a 363 page A4 sized book with full gloss covers.

This is a complete orchestral score with introduction by the composer and synopsis.

Cover Illustration: TED NASMITH ©2022 “Morgoth and the High King of the Noldor"
